common.what_languages_fluent: What languages can you speak fluently?

features.security: Experience enhanced tenant security with our comprehensive Renter Protection policy.
features.identity: Each property listed on our site undergoes thorough in-person inspections to ensure accuracy.
features.quality: We offer top-notch photos, videos, floor plans, and more to help you make informed decisions.
features.price: The prices you see are final - no hidden charges. Everything is clearly communicated upfront.

slider.welcome_description: Your top assistant in finding the perfect place is here! Which one of these are you?
slider.search_description: Search for the best place you can and get prepared to get it first! Are you ready for the next step?
slider.request_description: Already found the place? Amazing! Well, let's get it now! Just fill out your information and we are good to go!
slider.enjoy_description: Congratulations on your new place! Only thing to do is confirm your payment and you can get your keys!
slider.payment_description: Your payment is secure with us. It will only be processed 24 hours after your move-in. Enjoy your new place without worrying about your money!

city_selection.title: Where will your next stay be?

renter_protection.title: Renter Protection
renter_protection.stress_free_description: For 48 hours after you've moved into your new place, we will work to resolve any issues. If they cannot be resolved, we will issue you a full refund.
renter_protection.support_description: Our dedicated support team is available anytime during office hours to promptly resolve issues.
renter_protection.refund_description: If you have a bad experience and the property doesn't match, we'll give you a refund to make the process worry-free.

home.recommended: Recommended furnished apartments for your stay

app.title: Take Kaari With You
app.description: Find your perfect rental property on the go with our intuitive mobile app. Get instant notifications, chat with landlords in real-time, and secure your dream home faster.

list_property.title: List your Property on Kaari
list_property.subtitle: Free Photoshoot!
list_property.description: Indeed, there's no cost to list your apartment on Kaari. We collect a commission only after your flat is rented. Plus, we provide a free photoshoot and ensure your property is verified, all on the house.

property_list.waiting_tenants: amazing listing is waiting for new tenants

recommend_friend.title: Recommend a Friend
recommend_friend.description: Invite your friends to join Kaari and earn rewards when they sign up.
recommend_friend.banner_text: Get rewards for each friend who joins Kaari through your referral.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers.

messages.greeting_message: Hi! Nice to meet you! You can ask me anything...
messages.question_message: Hello there! I want to ask a few questions about your stay
messages.detailed_greeting: Hi! Nice to meet you! You can ask me anything anytime. I will try and respond as soon as possible. If I do not reply, call me on 070 123 45 67
messages.title: Messages

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.review_text_1: This was an amazing place to stay. The location was perfect, close to restaurants and public transportation. The apartment was clean and well-maintained. The host was very responsive and helpful throughout my stay.
reviews.review_text_2: I had a wonderful experience staying at this studio. It was exactly as described in the listing. The beach was just a short walk away, and there were plenty of shops and cafes nearby. The host provided excellent recommendations for local attractions.

support.title: Kaari Customer Support Available 24/7
support.description: Have questions or need assistance? Feel free to reach out to us using the contact form below or through our email and phone number. We're here to help!

photoshoot_banner.title: Book a Professional Photoshoot

referral_program.title: Kaari's Referral Program
referral_program.referral_code_info: Give tenants your unique promocode when you can't accommodate them. They get 200 MAD off, and you earn a bonus!
referral_program.current_bonus: Current bonus: {{bonus}} of tenant's first rent
referral_program.list_more_for_bonus: List 1 more property to get 8% bonus

referral_program.step_book: They book with another host using your code
referral_program.step_earn: You earn a percentage of their first month's rent
referral_program.promo_text: List more properties to increase your referral bonus percentage!

advertiser_thank_you.title: Your Account Has Been Created Successfully!
advertiser_thank_you.main_message: Thank you for joining us as an advertiser. We're excited to have you on board! Your account has been created and you can now start setting up your properties. Here's what you need to know:
advertiser_thank_you.next_steps_message: Complete your profile and add your first property listing in your dashboard. Our team will review your submission.
advertiser_thank_you.get_ready_message: Prepare high-quality photos and detailed descriptions of your properties to attract more potential clients.
advertiser_thank_you.launch_date_message: Once approved, your properties will be visible to all users searching in your area. We'll notify you when you're live!

slide1.title: Be One of Our First 100 Founding Partners
slide1.subtitle: Secure Your Spot as a Founding Partner – Enjoy Exclusive Perks for 3 Months

benefit1.title: 0% advertiser commission for 3 months
benefit1.description: Keep 100% of your rental income for the first three months.

benefit2.title: Access to the referral program
benefit2.description: Invite tenants or landlords to earn substantial rewards

benefit1.title: Free professional photoshoots
benefit1.description: Our team visits your property to take professional photos.

benefit2.title: No-hassle qualified tenants
benefit2.description: We bring ready, paying tenants to your door—no effort required from you

benefit1.title: Guaranteed full rent
benefit1.description: No need to worry about closing the deal or rental arrears

benefit2.title: Join our community
benefit2.description: Become part of Morocco's fastest growing rental platform
